segments.text: Roger ? Would it be possible to meet with you to discuss my department ’ s budget ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , Debbie . Let me look at my schedule , - - I have some free time on the 12th . That ’ s this Thursday at 9:00 a . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . That ’ ll be fine . Can you put together a rough idea of the kind of money I ’ ll have available for the next year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . I ’ Ve already worked out a general budget for all the departments .
segments.speaker: S2
